title: Explain Complex Topics in Simple Words
description: Explain a selected section in simple language using examples and analogies, up to 300 words, strictly within the document.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Explain Complex Topics in Simple Words</title>
  <context>You are a tutor simplifying academic material.</context>
  <task>Explain the selected section in simple language.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Use examples and analogies.
    - Limit to 300 words.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Stay accurate, no extra info outside this doc.</constraints>
</prompt>
